ProteinName	Molybdenum cofactor biosynthesis protein 1 (Cell migration-inducing gene 11 protein) (Molybdenum cofactor synthesis-step 1 protein A-B) [Includes: GTP 3',8-cyclase (EC 4.1.99.22) (Molybdenum cofactor biosynthesis protein A); Cyclic pyranopterin monophosphate synthase (EC 4.6.1.17) (Molybdenum cofactor biosynthesis protein C)]
GeneName	MOCS1 MIG11
Length	620
Function	Isoform MOCS1A and isoform MOCS1B probably form a complex that catalyzes the conversion of 5'-GTP to cyclic pyranopterin monophosphate (cPMP). MOCS1A catalyzes the cyclization of GTP to (8S)-3',8-cyclo-7,8-dihydroguanosine 5'-triphosphate and MOCS1B catalyzes the subsequent conversion of (8S)-3',8-cyclo-7,8-dihydroguanosine 5'-triphosphate to cPMP.
